aws_network_interface.description: Provides an Elastic network interface (ENI) resource.

subnet_id.description: Subnet ID to create the ENI in.

description.description: A description for the network interface.

private_ips.description: List of private IPs to assign to the ENI.

private_ips_count.description: Number of secondary private IPs to assign to the ENI. The total number of private IPs will be 1 + private_ips_count, as a primary private IP will be assiged to an ENI by default.

security_groups.description: List of security group IDs to assign to the ENI.

attachment.description: Block to define the attachment of the ENI. Documented below.

source_dest_check.description: Whether to enable source destination checking for the ENI. Default true.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

instance.description: ID of the instance to attach to.

device_index.description: Integer to define the devices index.

id.description: The ID of the network interface.

subnet_id.description: Subnet ID the ENI is in.

mac_address.description: The MAC address of the network interface.

private_dns_name.description: The private DNS name of the network interface (IPv4).

description.description: A description for the network interface.

private_ips.description: List of private IPs assigned to the ENI.

security_groups.description: List of security groups attached to the ENI.

attachment.description: Block defining the attachment of the ENI.

source_dest_check.description: Whether source destination checking is enabled
